mapper.update: update t_sysconfig set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSCODE = #{syscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSNAME = #{sysname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSVALUE = #{sysvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, SYSCODE, SYSNAME, SYSVALUE from t_sysconfig where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, SYSCODE, SYSNAME, SYSVALUE from t_sysconfig
